Summary. - I briefly introduce the status of charm physics and I discuss the case
of the meson with open charm DsJ (2700).

1. – Introduction
This period can be considered a sort of "Renaissance" for charm physics. Recently,
a great number of new states have been discovered in both the open and the hidden
∗

(2317), DsJ (2460), DsJ (2700), DsJ (2860),

physics is due to the fact that some of the above states fail to fit into standard classification. This fact has lead people to propose many interpretations, like molecular
charmonium, hybrids, orbital and radial excitations, tetraquarks, and so on. In this paper I discuss the case of the cs̄ meson DsJ (2700), giving hints on how to classify it. For
a more comprehensive discussion on charm physics the reader can refer to [1].
